description:
If you have recently purchased or plan to use the Sony A7RII as your primary camera, this is the course for you. Even if you've never used a DSLR before, or are brand new to photography, this course will work to build your understanding of both the camera and general photography from the ground up.

This is a relatively short course â€“ about four and a half hours is all it takes to become a master with this camera. Lectures are 100% easy-to-follow videos, with plenty of clear diagrams that will construct your understanding of the camera dynamically. Topics include understanding the basics of photography and then building up to using the camera, menus, special features, video and Michael's recommendations.
title: Sony A7RII Crash Course
